turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need help with anything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a caffe grande caffe latte from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, so you are ordering a grande caffe latte with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: at 2130 H Street in Washington DC.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say eighth street or H street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one moment while i send your order to that location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a grande caffe latte with 2% milk to be picked up at 2130 H street in Washington dc, your order will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
